pr_title: Fix search errors detection and refactor search tests

timeline.message: Include errors from child collectors in the search collector
Always return a new item collector in the search extractor
Improve search extractor tests for services
[YouTube] Check if channel item has subscription count in search
[YouTube] Add check for channel items without description in search
[YouTube] Add check for channel items with no video count in search
[PeerTube] Update video used in age limit test (was 404 not found)

timeline.bodyText: Do we really need a getInfoItemSearchCollector() function? We don't have one in the other kind of extractors either. Otherwise this PR looks good, however you'll need to do YouTube Music tests as well when that PR gets merged.
timeline.author: wb9688

timeline.bodyText: Here you will need to return ListExtractor.ITEM_COUNT_UNKNOWN after #280 is merged
timeline.author: Stypox
Stypox

replies.bodyText: Forgot about those, thanks for the reminder, much cleaner!
replies.author: mauriciocolli

timeline.message: Remove unnecessary collector creation function from search extractor
Use easier-to-read asserts statements in tests
